DOC.brief_title: New Classification Stomach Using Probe-based Confocal Laser Endomicroscopy
DOC.detailed_description: Probe-based confocal laser endomicroscopy ( pCLE ; Cellvizio , Mauna Kea Technologies , Paris , France ) newly develop endoscopic device allow application laser microscopy conventional endoscope mosaic image . Previous study demonstrate application various GI disease , include Barrett 's esophagus , colonic adenoma , ulcerative colitis , etc . However , limited data provide explore application pCLE stomach . Therefore , aim present study propose new pCLE classification gastric pit pattern vessel architecture , assess accuracy interobserver agreement new pCLE classification system stomach .
